abstract: Since Cnooc was rebuffed in its attempt to buy Unocal, China has focused on gaining access to resources rather than acquiring companies.
snippet: Since Cnooc was rebuffed in its attempt to buy Unocal, China has focused on gaining access to resources rather than acquiring companies.
lead_paragraph: Cnooc, China’s top offshore oil explorer, said on Sunday that it had secured a South American beachhead by agreeing to pay $3.1 billion in cash for a stake in one of the largest Argentine oil explorers, with fields in Argentina, Bolivia and Chile.

headline.main: Deal for South American Oil Fields Extends China’s Global Quest for Energy
headline.print_headline: Deal for South American Oil Fields Extends China’s Global Quest for Energy

abstract: Cnooc, China’s top offshore oil explorer, said on Sunday that it had secured a South American beachhead by agreeing to pay $3.1 billion in cash for a stake in one of the largest Argentine oil explorers, with fields in Argentina, Bolivia and Chile.
snippet: Cnooc, China’s top offshore oil explorer, said on Sunday that it had secured a South American beachhead by agreeing to pay $3.1 billion in cash for a stake in one of the largest Argentine oil explorers, with fields in Argentina, Bolivia and Chile.
lead_paragraph: Cnooc, China’s top offshore oil explorer, said on Sunday that it had secured a South American beachhead by agreeing to pay $3.1 billion in cash for a stake in one of the largest Argentine oil explorers, with fields in Argentina, Bolivia and Chile.

headline.main: Deal for Oil Fields Extends China’s Quest for Energy

abstract: Bank of America, the largest U.S. bank, plans to seek approval to expand its operations in China, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Bank of America, the largest U.S. bank, plans to seek approval to expand its operations in China, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America, the largest United States bank, plans to seek approval to expand its operations in China, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the situation.

headline.main: BofA Said to Eye China Expansion
